mapper.select: SELECT count(mbr_name) FROM TBL_MBR WHERE MBR_DEL_CHK='N' AND MBR_NAME = #{mbrName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MBR(MBR_NUM, MBR_NAME, MBR_JOIN_DATE, MBR_PWD, MBR_ID, MBR_DEL_CHK) VALUES((select lpad(nvl(count(mbr_num),0)+1,4,'0') from tbl_mbr), #{mbrName}, sysdate, #{mbrPwd}, #{mbrId}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT mbr_num, mbr_name, mbr_id FROM TBL_MBR WHERE mbr_del_chk = 'N' AND mbr_pwd = #{mbrPwd} AND mbr_id = #{mbrId}
